sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useConstruction } from '../../context/ConstructionContext'; import '../../styles/pages.css'; const PaymentHistory = () => { const { getAllPayments, getTotalPaidAmount, stages, expenses } = useConstruction(); const payments = getAllPayments(); const totalPaid = getTotalPaidAmount(); const getItemName = (payment) => { if (payment.paymentType === 'construction') { const stage = stages.find(s => s.id === payment.itemId); return stage ? stage.name : 'Unknown Stage'; } else { const expense = expenses.find(e => e.id === payment.itemId); return expense ? expense.name : 'Unknown Expense'; } }; const getPaymentTypeColor = (type) => { return type === 'construction' ? '#3498db' : '#9b59b6'; }; const formatPaymentType = (type) => { return type === 'construction' ? 'Construction' : 'Expense'; }; return (

Payment History

Total Paid Amount

₹{totalPaid.toLocaleString('en-IN')}

{payments.filter(p => p.paymentType === 'construction').length}

Construction Payments

{payments.filter(p => p.paymentType === 'expense').length}

Expense Payments

{payments.length}

Total Payments

All Payments

{payments.length === 0 ? (

No Payment Records

No payments have been recorded yet.

) : (
{payments.map((payment) => ( ))}
Date Type Item Description Amount Method
{payment.date} {formatPaymentType(payment.paymentType)} {getItemName(payment)} {payment.description} ₹{payment.amount.toLocaleString('en-IN')} {payment.method === 'bank-transfer' ? 'Bank Transfer' : payment.method === 'upi' ? 'UPI' : payment.method.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + payment.method.slice(1)}
)}

Payment Breakdown

Construction Payments: ₹{payments.filter(p => p.paymentType === 'construction') .reduce((sum, p) => sum + p.amount, 0) .toLocaleString('en-IN')}
Expense Payments: ₹{payments.filter(p => p.paymentType === 'expense') .reduce((sum, p) => sum + p.amount, 0) .toLocaleString('en-IN')}
Total Paid: ₹{totalPaid.toLocaleString('en-IN')}
); }; export default PaymentHistory;
